features.title: Powerful Features for Customer Success
features.description: Everything you need to monitor customer satisfaction, reduce churn, and scale your retainer-based business with AI intelligence.

features.title: AI-Powered Customer Analysis
features.description: Advanced AI analyzes all customer communications to identify sentiment, risks, and opportunities automatically.

features.title: Daily Customer Updates
features.description: Get daily summaries of how each customer is doing, what needs attention, and who's at risk of churning.

features.title: Proactive Risk Detection
features.description: Spot unhappy customers and potential churn risks before they become problems with intelligent alerts.

features.title: Email & Call Monitoring
features.description: Automatically read and analyze all customer emails and calls to understand sentiment and satisfaction.

features.title: Project Management Integration
features.description: Sync with your existing project management tools to get complete visibility into customer relationships.

features.title: Smart Notifications
features.description: Get instant alerts when customers need attention, are unhappy, or present upsell opportunities.

features.title: Team Performance Insights
features.description: Monitor how your service employees are performing and identify coaching opportunities or praise-worthy actions.

features.title: Customer Communication Patterns
features.description: Track changes in customer communication patterns to identify who needs more attention or follow-up.

features.title: Upsell Opportunity Detection
features.description: Identify customers who might be ready for additional services or upgrades based on their interactions.
